sentences.sContent: ...fears of an organized attempt to disenfranchise supporters of Father Aristide.
sentences.sCn: …对剥夺阿里斯蒂德神父支持者选举权的一次有组织企图的担心。

remMethod.val: disenfranchise=disfranchise， dis(剥夺) + franchise(选举权) → 剥夺选取权 → 剥夺…的公民权

trans.tranOther: to take away someone’s rights, especially their right to vote
